name: Take-a-way.co.uk
tag_list: takeaway, restaurant, local, chinese, indian, pizza, burger, kebab, food, menu, delivers
description: Free listing of takeaway and restaurants
overview:
Lists menu images to takeaways and restaurants in the uk free of charge on a plain clutter free site. Menus can be searched by phone, cuisine, town or postcode.

Many small one man takeaways do not have websites or the budget for them so this is a way to get online advertising without breaking the bank.

Many other websites charge for advertising or listings, this is not the police here, the idea is to help the small business food vendor compete with the big boys.

For those among us who have trouble reading the small print of the menus posted through our doors this is an excellent site to zoom in and magnify images ans save eye strain.

Menus images are kept small to reduce download time for those without broadband at a reasonable speed and for mobile phone users.
